explains: v. 送入医院疗养（或治疗）

sentences.en: Mrs Smith seriously ill already hospitalize.
sentences.cn: 史密斯夫人病重已住院。

sentences.en: We must also move, evacuate, and hospitalize personnel.
sentences.cn: 我们还必须对人员进行运送、撤离和治疗。

sentences.en: This is the first time to hospitalize in his remaining years.
sentences.cn: 这是他生命中的第一次住院。
